summary: SummaryHighlightsClean IngredientsCruelty FreeGive BackI'm From Black Rice Toner is a balancing Korean toner that hydrates while controlling excess oil. Enriched with antioxidant-rich black rice, it refines texture, improves elasticity, and keeps skin feeling fresh, calm, and nourished without clogging pores.
details: DetailsBenefitsHydrates without heavinessRegulates oil and sebum productionRefines texture and improves elasticityPrepares skin for better absorption of skincareSuitable for oily, combination, and sensitive skinKey IngredientsBlack Rice Extract - Balances oil levels, hydrates, and protects with powerful antioxidantsBeta-Glucan - Soothes irritation and boosts skin resilienceHyaluronic Acid - Deeply hydrates and plumps skinPanthenol (Pro-Vitamin B5) - Strengthens the barrier and calms inflammationGlycerin - Locks in moisture and softens skinItem 2642146How To UseBefore use, shake well to mix the water and emulsion layers.After cleansing, dispense on a cotton pad and wipe off or press onto dry areas.IngredientsWater, Oryza Sativa (Rice) Water, Dicaprylyl Ether, Methylpropanediol, Hydrogenated Poly(C6-14 Olefin), 1,2-Hexanediol, Niacinamide, Sodium Chloride, Glycerin, Melia Azadirachta Flower Extract, Propanediol, Hydrogenated Lecithin, Polyglyceryl-10 Myristate, Coccinia Indica Fruit Extract, Ethylhexylglycerin, Adenosine, Xanthan Gum, Theobroma Cacao (Cocoa) Extract, Dextrin, Polyglycerin-3, Oryza Sativa (Rice) Extract, Tocopherol, Sodium Hyaluronate Crosspolymer, Polyglyceryl-10 Laurate, Butylene Glycol, Oryza Sativa (Rice) Bran Oil, Polyglutamic Acid, Panthenol, Xylose, Glycolic Acid, Disodium EDTA, Anthocyanins.
how_to_use: Before use, shake well to mix the water and emulsion layers.After cleansing, dispense on a cotton pad and wipe off or press onto dry areas.

reviews.headline: Amazingggg
reviews.comments: I wasnt sure about getting this but I had seen a few people saying how good it was on tiktok and decided to give it a shot since I know i can return it easily if I didnt like it. But that wasnt needed, I absolutely love this stuff! I was in desperate need of a toner to add to my routine to hold in hydration to my skin and its done exactly that. Im less oily, my overall face has brightened since adding into my routine and my pores are so small now! I love using this right before putting on my cosrx snail mucin essence I really think they work so well together to hydrate and brighten my face, this is definitely worth getting!

reviews.headline: Seems to be working great
reviews.comments: I was apprehensive with buying this product since there were no views but i love it so far. I have oily skin but seems to be taming it so far.

reviews.headline: Love this!
reviews.comments: I've been using this toner consistenty for a few weeks now and have definitely noticed a big improvement. My skin is more hydrated, even, and radiant. I have oily skin so was a bit nervous to try this, but it's not greasy on me at all. Totally recommed giving this a try!
